Text.content: OpenCms allows fields in the content editor to be made dependent on other fields. You can listen to changes made in an editor field and then react to that change by adjusting values in other fields. Potentially, you can react also in a different way if you write your own change handler. Which handler listens to which editor fields (or, more precisely, to changes on which schema elements) is configured in the schema definition of a content type.
